name: Cross Chop
description: You crush a creature with a strong sideways strike. Make a melee attack against a target, doing 4d4 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. Cross Chop results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.

effect.name: Affected by how well the previous Pokémon's move went.
effect.effect: 4 if previous Pokémon’s move was a Nat 20 and raised the crowd meter, 3 appeal if previous Pokémon’s move raised crowd meter, 2 if previous Pokémon’s move kept crowd meter the same, 1 if previous Pokémon’s move lowered the crowd meter.
